The Features & Product Description !!! Features: Stainless Steel case and alloy chain Elegant design with precise mechanical movement Skeleton and transparent dial shows exquisite movement and structure within the watch Removable stainless steel chain with a clip at the end Classic series pocket watch is a good present for your love, seniority or yourself Measurements: Case diameter: approx. 4.6 cm Case thickness: approx. 1.5 cm (cover included) Chain length: approx. 37.5 cm (hook included) Watch weight: approx. 76 g Package includes: 1 * Pocket watch 1 * Chain belt 1 * Box Instructions: Once you receive the mechanical watch, open the watch first. Press the crown at the top of watch, the front plate will open. Setting time: pull the crown away from base of the watch and turn the crown clockwise until it reaches the exact time. Winding the watch: push the crown back into place along the base of the watch and winding up the watch clockwise rotation 20 times; Please do not over winding up the watch if you feel the crown is tight.
